channel.title: Server Status Submition
channel.description:
Moparscape has a good server status page there is no denying that. Although I too have "one". Actually I have 2. One uses images, And the other uses txt based indication.
Now I would like to add MORE servers to the list. to do this you need the following in the body
Server hours Server Administrator Administration E-mail (kept secret if chosen) Server Name Server IP after you have filled that out you can e-mail it to serverapplication@h4ckers-network.com If you want to see if your server was added you can check by going to: http://www.h4ckers-network.com/serverstatus.php
P.S this is advertising my server + my server status page yet was locked from the advertisement page because it was for advertising.
copied and pased my original post since it was locked in the right section i figured id post it in the wrong section maybe i will eventually hit the right one.

item.title: Server Status Submition
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

[quote=“BobDole81, post:4, topic:62969”]Meh, there’s no place for general private server discussion…but as this forum allows for development discussion, this is probably the best forum for it.

@LegendScape: As I believe I have given you your “valid reason,” I think it may be worth removing that quote.[/quote]

I still think it should have been in the advertising section but that is only my opinion and i do ask that you forgive my “pm”<–original

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Submition
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

Moparscape has a good server status page there is no denying that. Although I too have “one”. Actually I have 2. One uses images, And the other uses txt based indication.

Now I would like to add MORE servers to the list. to do this you need the following in the body

Server hours
Server Administrator
Administration E-mail (kept secret if chosen)
Server Name
Server IP
after you have filled that out you can e-mail it to serverapplication@h4ckers-network.com
If you want to see if your server was added you can check by going to: http://www.h4ckers-network.com/serverstatus.php

P.S this is advertising my server + my server status page yet was locked from the advertisement page because it was for advertising.

copied and pased my original post since it was locked in the right section i figured id post it in the wrong section maybe i will eventually hit the right one.

Read full topic
